Title: Discharge methods of and physical harm done by bacterial weapons
Designer: General Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军总参谋部)
Publisher: General Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军总参谋部)
Notes: On the left a Mao quotation: "Mobilize the people to practice hygiene, to eradicate disease, to raise the level of health, to smash the enemy’s bacteriological warfare."Nr. 16 of the set 'Posters showing measures against atomic, chemical and bacterial warfare' (1971).
